text:
👣 Monday the 8th March will be our first step on the Road Map out of #Lockdown. Whilst this is a welcome relief to everyone we must tread carefully 👣 We must all remember to follow #SocialDistancing, Face Coverings and Hands Face Space!
#RoadmapOutOfLockdown #COVID19 #vaccine https://t.co/bIJDfE0RiO
